column2: CORRECTED-Boeing receives U.S. approval for wider 787 operationsUPDATE 1-Boeing 787 receives U.S. approval for extended operations WASHINGTON
column3: May 28 The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration on Wednesday approved  extended operations for Boeing's 787 Dreamliner

column2: St. Jude to acquire CardioMEMS following FDA approval of device May 28 St. Jude Medical Inc said on Wednesday it plans to exercise its option to buy the shares of CardioMEMS it does not already own for $375 million following news the Food and Drug Administration has approved CardioMEMS's wireless heart device.
